note.p: Birth: Newcastle upon Tyne, Northumberland, England (15 February 1816)

Career: Joined his father's iron works, Walker, Tyneside; started a chemical works near Gateshead (1852), and a metallurgical works making iron and steel; member of Council, Newcastle College of Science
Memberships: FCS; Iron and Steel Institute (President 1873-1875); MIMechE; Northern Mining Institute; Natural History Society of Manchester
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1906-1907 vol 78 pp xiv-xviii signed by A N
